{"id":1013022030,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691248802,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1013022030/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Seconds to Equalize a Circular Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumSeconds(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int mxm=0;\n        map<int,int>mp;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            mp[nums[i]]++;\n        }\n        if(mp.size()==1)return 0;\n        for(auto x:mp){\n            if(x.second>mxm)mxm=x.second;\n        }\n        int c=0;\n        for(auto x:mp){\n            if(x.second==mxm){c=x.first;}\n        }\n        \n        int cnt=0;\n        int ans=0;\n        int n=nums.size();\n        if(mxm==1)return n/2;\n        set<int>ind;\n        while(true){\n            if(cnt<n){\n                \n                for(auto x:ind){\n                    nums[x]=c;\n                \n                }\n                  \n                \n            for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n               \n               if(nums[i]!=c){\n                    if(nums[(i - 1 + n) % n]==c||nums[(i + 1 + n) % n]==c){\n                        ind.insert(i);\n                        cnt++;\n                   }\n\n                         \n               }else if(nums[i]==c)cnt++;\n\n            }\n            }else break;\n            ans++;\n            \n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-seconds-to-equalize-a-circular-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
